name: Banderhobb
languages: understands Common and the languages of its creator

abilities.name: Resonant Connection.
abilities.description: If the banderhobb has even a tiny piece of a creature or an obect in its possession, such as a lock of hair or a splinter of wood, it knows the most direct route to that creature or object if it is within1 mile of the banderhobb.

abilities.name: Shadow Stealth.
abilities.description: While in dim light or darkness, the banderhobb can take the Hide action as a bonus action.
